ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 541
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL Barto!  I found that when I go into the bazaar..I hop inside the bank and face a wall...right up against it...then I can open my windows and do all my
ygData.messageBody:
LOL Barto!  I found that when I go into the bazaar..I hop inside the bank and face a wall...right up against it...then I can open my windows and do all my business without any lag.  this gets me all set and ready so that when I get to my vendor curb, I just do /trader and I'm good to go.  Hope this helps.  By the way..I think the Bazaar rocks!! =)  I'm on Kane Bayle...and even with it being a very small population, the Bazaar is always full.  It's turning into the hookup place....shop, get a group, sell stuff...it's like the mall on Saturday nite! ;)
 
Lylyth Faire
DE Cleric of the 30th Season
Kane Bayle
 
Jaelin Jinn'Marid
WE Ranger of the 28th Season
Terris Thule
 
Jaeal Ohh
DE Rogue of the 26th Season
Vallon Zek
Message: 2
   Date: Sat, 27 Jul 2002 01:35:06 -0000
   From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
Subject: bazaar

Went there this morning to set up some sales. Lag was terrible. It
was hard to even get my cursor on target. I suppose it will be ok
once I get set up to sell, but the set up is terrible. Move cursor.
Not on object. Move a bit more. Not on object. Move back. Click.
Don't have object. Click again. Hmph. Had object but didn't know it,
and just put it back. Click...

Took so long that I didn't finish setting up before I had to log. I
wouldn't have logged if I could have left my toon to do business
while I was gone, but no such luck.

I just gotta get another machine, faster connection, and retire from
my job so that I can play all the time.

Barto Proudfoot
